timeline.title: Masters in Computer and Information Science and Engineering
timeline.description: Focused on Mathematics, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science and Algorithms with emphasis on problem-solving and analytical thinking.
achievements: Designed and built GatorCan, a Full-stack educational platform for seamless course management and collaboration.
Developed an Object Oriented version of Pascal Programming language

timeline.title: Automation Developer
timeline.description: Engineered a chatbot and automation suite using Power Automate, Flask, and Python, reducing downtime by 10% and saving 800+ hours annually through cross-platform task automation. Enhanced system performance by 93% via multithreaded DB optimization and secured access with a custom Dataverse-based authorization framework, cutting admin overhead by 20%.
achievements: Developed and deployed a chatbot solution leveraging Power Automate (PVA) and Flask REST API to automate key processes acrossmultiple applications, resulting in a 10% reduction in downtime.

Automated repetitive tasks across mainframes, Windows, web applications, and databases using Python and Shell scripting,saving 800+ hours of manual effort annually and improving team productivity by 20%. This allowed teams to focus on higher-valuetasks, driving better business outcomes

Built a custom authorization mechanism with Dataverse and Python to manage secure, role-based access across applications,ensuring compliance and reducing risks associated with unauthorized access. Resulting in smooth user access management, reducingadministrative overhead by 20%.

Optimized database operations by implementing multithreading techniques, improving application performance and optimizingprocessing times by 93% (from 240 sec. to 16 sec.). This enhanced efficiency and reliability for critical business processes.

timeline.title: Fullstack Developer
timeline.description: Built a secure, real-time order tracking portal that reduced response time by 90%, automated 3 key workflows, and saved 720+ hours annually while cutting support tickets by 40%.
achievements: Designed and developed a web-based order tracking portal using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and MS SQL to enable real-timeorder status tracking, reducing response time by 90% and saving 500 hours annually by eliminating manual ticket inquiries.

Integrated role-based authorization and security groups to ensure secure login and compliance, minimizing related incidents by30%. Implemented robust error handling and logging, improving reliability and shrinking downtime by 15%.

Optimized the order tracking process by automating manual workflows, decoupling dependency on support tickets by 40%, andimproving overall operational efficiency for end-users, saving 200 hours annually in manual effort.

timeline.title: Bachelor of Technology
timeline.company: Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam Technical University
timeline.description: Comprehensive study of computer science fundamentals, software engineering, and modern programming paradigms.
achievements: Designed and built apniPharmacy, a platform to collect and provide unused medicines to NGOs which then reaches to the people in need
Lead a team of 5 to organize drones designing and building workshop with IIT Kanpur startup ‚ÄúPi Drones‚Äù, which was first of its kind, in the campus.
Lead a team of 10 to organize Codezilla, an inter-college coding hackathon.
Led a team of 20 volunteers to organize hospitality services for over 600+ attendees during the Universal Human Values and Professional Ethics Conference.
